components.mentoring.session.guidance.th:
**Functional Purpose**: Header for the exemplar solution accordion section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> Exemplar solution section header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing guidance for a mentoring session, if an exemplar solution is available.
**Technical Context**: This text serves as the title for an expandable section.
**Current English**: "The exemplar solution"
components.mentoring.session.guidance.tr:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text providing guidance to the mentor regarding the exemplar solution.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> Exemplar solution section.
**When Users See This**: When the mentor expands the 'The exemplar solution' section.
**Technical Context**: This paragraph guides the mentor on how to use the exemplar solution.
**Current English**: "Try and guide the student towards this solution. It is the best place for them to reach at this point during the Track."
components.mentoring.session.guidance.ex:
**Functional Purpose**: Header for the exercise notes accordion section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> Exercise notes section header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing guidance for a mentoring session.
**Technical Context**: This text serves as the title for an expandable section.
**Current English**: "Exercise notes"
components.mentoring.session.guidance.tr:
**Functional Purpose**: Header for the track notes accordion section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> Track notes section header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing guidance for a mentoring session.
**Technical Context**: This text serves as the title for an expandable section.
**Current English**: "Track notes"
components.mentoring.session.guidance.ho:
**Functional Purpose**: Header for the mentor's solution accordion section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> How you solved the exercise section header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing guidance for a mentoring session, if the mentor has provided a solution.
**Technical Context**: This text serves as the title for an expandable section.
**Current English**: "How you solved the exercise"
components.mentoring.session.guidance.au:
**Functional Purpose**: Header for the automated feedback accordion section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> Automated feedback section header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing guidance for a mentoring session, if automated feedback is available.
**Technical Context**: This text serves as the title for an expandable section.
**Current English**: "Automated feedback"
components.mentoring.session.guidance.fe:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text indicating where automated feedback will be displayed.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session -> Guidance tab -> Automated feedback section.
**When Users See This**: When the mentor expands the 'Automated feedback' section.
**Technical Context**: This is currently placeholder text.
**Current English**: "Feedback here"
